item.title: 317,PI,itemonNPC
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

[code] public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) {
switch(itemId) {

	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player used Item id: "+itemId+" with Npc id: "+npcId+" With Slot : "+slot);
		break;
	}
	
}

}[/code]
wut is wrong?

compiler

src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: illegal start of expression public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: illegal start of expression public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: ';' expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: ')' expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: illegal start of expression public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: ';' expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: not a statement public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: ';' expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: <identifier> expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: not a statement public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:286: ';' expected public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) { ^ src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:298: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .
